cbioportalR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reference

    All functions

    all_available_panels()

    Get all available gene panels in a database

    all_genes_lookup

    A table to lookup Hugo Symbol by Entrez ID

    available_profiles()

    See what genetic data is available for a given study

    cbp_api()

    Core function to retrieve data from cBioPortal API.

    check_for_saved_db()

    Check for cBioPortal DB

    get_alias()

    Get Gene Name Alias for a Given Hugo Symbol

    get_cbioportal_db()

    Connect to cBioPortal DB

    get_cbioportal_token()

    Get cBioPortal Access Token

    get_clinical_attributes()

    Get all clinical attributes available for a study

    get_clinical_by_patient()

    Get clinical data by attribute study ID and sample ID

    get_clinical_by_study()

    Get all available clinical data for a specified study

    get_cna()

    Get copy number alterations by sample ID or study ID

    get_gene_id()

    Get Entrez Gene ID for a given set of Hugo Symbols

    get_genes()

    Get a list of all available genes

    get_genetics()

    Get all genetic data for a study or list of IDs

    get_mutations()

    Get gene mutations by sample ID or Study

    get_panel()

    Retrieve data for a specific panel

    get_sample_ids() get_sample_ids()

    Get sample IDs for a given set of patient IDs

    get_segments()

    Get segmentation data

    get_studies()

    Get information about available studies in a cBioPortal instance

    impact_gene_info

    IMPACT Gene Meta Data

    tcga_genes

    A vector of 19441 hugo symbols in TCGA

    tcga_samples

    Data frame of all TCGA sample ids and their corresponding cancer type

    Contents

    Developed by Karissa Whiting, Axel Martin, Arshi Arora.
